summary: Premium tier website for Abilene Downtown Antique Mall featuring high‑quality visuals, immersive animations, comprehensive dealer and inventory content, robust SEO strategy, lead capture forms, and optional integrations with social media and local event calendars.
sections: Hero with parallax animation and tagline overlay
About Us – history, mission, team bios
Dealers – interactive directory with filters and profile cards
Inventory – searchable catalog with high‑res images, video tours, and purchase links
Gallery – full‑screen masonry layout with lightbox, animated hover effects
Events – calendar integration, RSVP widget, map with dealer locations
Blog – featured posts, author bios, SEO‑optimized categories
Contact – dynamic form, map, phone/email, social icons
Footer – quick links, newsletter signup, privacy policy, social feeds
style_notes: Use a warm, earthy color palette (deep browns, terracotta, muted gold) to reflect antiques. Incorporate handcrafted typography (serif with subtle flourishes) and custom iconography inspired by vintage signs. Animations should be subtle (fade‑in, slide‑up, scroll‑triggered parallax) to enhance storytelling without distracting. Mobile‑first responsive design with touch‑friendly interactions. Include micro‑interactions on buttons, form fields, and dealer profile reveals.
assets_needed: High‑resolution images of the mall interior, exterior, and featured items
Custom hand‑drawn icons for categories (furniture, glassware, signs, etc.)
Parallax background images for hero section
SEO keyword research report for antique market & local search terms
Copywriting for dealer bios, blog posts, and landing pages
Lead capture form integration (Mailchimp/HubSpot) and privacy policy text
Event calendar data (JSON or API access)
Social media feeds (Facebook, Instagram) embed code
